title: Testimony Videos of Muslims who have converted to Christianity
description:
Testimony videos of Muslims who have converted to Christianity.

Every year scores of Muslims leave Islam and convert to Christianity. In the north Indian state of Kashmir alone, Muslim turned Christian evangelist Rasheed Alamir estimates that around 2,000 muslims become christians every year (source: BOCI monthly magazines). This is in spite of Muhammad&#039;s (founder of Islam) open command to slaughter every muslim who leaves islam.  

In these videos, Muslims talk about what drew them to Christianity and why they left Islam.

Spoken Language: English
Texted Language: Arabic

Please seed for as long as possible. May God bless you all.

Uploaded by Indian Christian
